review: I am happy with this item. I can now watch Netflix listen to pandora through my tv. My only disappointment is due to the fact that I have a Cruz tablet and it is not Google certfied so I am unable to download the Chromecast app and fully utilize the functions of this device. This might be useful info for people who want to take advantage of it's full functionality. When I  update my tablet I hope this will allow me to do much more in the future. I would still recommend this product.
author: steve

review: great device at a great price! i mainly use it for Netlix and youtube videos. simple, effective and great for basic use *thumbs up*
author: Angie

review: Google Chromecast was relatively easy to set up, I ran into some issues due to my specific wireless router. Other than that, I love that I can stream anything from my computer to the tv. It's also really clear!
author: Alana

review: I bought this dongle to stream at college. It didn't work with my college wi-fi. I immediately gifted it to my parents, and it has changed their lives. I would have given it five stars, but I had that minor issue. Otherwise, it does what it should: it streams wirelessly from your computer to your TV. High-five for Google.Minor note: The image quality could be a little better sometimes, but it really depends on the size and model of the TV you're outputting to.
author: KNDZ

review: It was a pain to work out the set up. After a two days of watchin Netflix content on the big screen via Wi-Fi ,instead through wire from a mode,it stop downlouding . I am waiting for a response from the Chromecast about the displayd message/error. Not happy at all. Even the $35 for it seems a good deal....not in my houshold.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The google chromecast is an amazing device to have if you dont already have a smart tv. It is great for your bedroom or even living room, It works great and it stays cool. It actually does what is advertised, and smoothly. The setup is very fast and easy. Only wish that I could have set it up from my smart phone instead of having to get it set up on my laptop. I have synced it with my phone, tablet, and laptop and works great with each one and does what is advertised! It is fairly cheap, and alot cheaper than a new smart tv, it does the same tasks and its fast!
author: King

review: I have 2 Roku boxes and love using the Chromecast over both of them. I love the fact that your remote is the native app on your device. It makes going through services like Netflix so much more intuitive and easy.And the quality of the quality of videos is top notch. No lag and the streaming video looks beautiful.And with all the new apps being introduced the Chromecast is a must buy at such a great price.
author: Vic C

review: This is a good concept but needs more work. Its use is very limited to about 3 apps. And your youtube will not display subtitles if you need to

review: What an amazing device for only $35. I was thinking about getting the Roku, but I am glad I bought this instead. The only thing needed now is to be able to access more media content from other providers.
